Verses: 1 naangal Thappik Karaiserndhapinbu, Andhath Theevinper Meliththaa Endru Arindhom.

2 anniyaraagiya Andhath Theevaar Engalukkup Paaraattina Anbu Konjamalla. Andha Velaiyile Pidiththirundha Mazhaikkaagavum Kulirukkaagavum Avargal Neruppai Mootti, Engal Anaivaraiyum Serththukkondaargal.
3 pavul Sila Viragugalai Vaari Andhaneruppinmel Podugaiyil, Oru Viriyanpaambu Analuraiththup Purappattu Avanudaiya Kaiyaik Kavvikkondadhu.

4 vishappoochchi Avan Kaiyile Thongugiradhai Anniyaraagiya Andhath Theevaar Kandabodhu, Indha Manushan Kolaipaadhagan, Idharkuch Sandhegamillai; Ivan Samuththiraththukkuth Thappivandhum, Pazhiyaanadhu Ivanaip Pizhaikkavottavillaiyendru Thangalukkulle Sollikkondaargal.
5 avan Andhap Poochchiyaith Theeyile Udharippottu, Oru Theengum Adaiyaadhirundhaan.

6 avanukku Veekkankandu, Alladhu Avan Sadidhiyaai Vizhundhu Saavaanendru Avargal Paarththukkondirundhaargal; Neduneramaaip Paarththukkondirundhum, Oru Sedhamum Avanukku Varaadhadhaik Kandabodhu, Veru Sindhaiyaagi, Ivan Dhevanendru Sollikkondaargal.
7 theevukku Mudhalaaliyaagiya Pupiliyu Ennum Perkondavanudaiya Nilangal Andha Idaththirkuch Sameebamaayirundhadhu, Avan Engalai Etrukkondu, Moondrunaal Patchamaai Visaariththaan.
8 pupiliyuvinudaiya Thagappan Juraththinaalum Raththabedhiyinaalum Varuththappattuk Kidandhaan; Pavul Avanidaththirkup Poi Jebampanni, Avanmel Kaigalai Vaiththu, Avanaik Gunamaakkinaan.
9 idhu Nadandhapinbu, Theevile Irundhamatra Viyaadhikkaararum Vandhu, Gunamaakkappattaargal.
10 avargal Engalukku Anega Mariyaadhai Seydhu, Naangal Kappal Erippogirabodhu Engalukkuth Thevaiyaanavaigalai Etrinaargal.
11 moondrumaadham Sendrapinbu, Andha Theevile Mazhaikaalaththirkuth Thangiyirundha Midhunam Ennum Adaiyaalamudaiya Aleksandhiriyaa Pattanaththuk Kappalile Naangal Erip Purappattu,
12 seerakoosaa Pattanaththaich Serndhu, Ange Moondrunaal Thanginom.
13 avvidam Vittuch Sutriyodi, Regiyu Thuraimugaththukku Vandhu Serndhom. Marunaalil Thendrar Kaatredukkaiyil Purappattu, Irandaam Naal Puththeyoli Pattanaththirku Vandhu,
14 ange Sagodhararaik Kandom; Avargal Engalai Ezhunaal Thangalidaththil Irukkumpadi Vendikkondaargal; Andhappadi Naangal Irundhu Pinbu Romaaburikkup Ponom.

15 avvidaththilulla Sagodharargal Naangal Varugira Seydhiyaik Kelvippattu, Silar Appiyupuramvaraikkum, Silar Moondru Saththiramvaraikkum, Engalukku Edhirkonduvandhaargal; Avargalaip Pavul Kandu, Dhevanai Sthoththiriththuth Dhairiyamadaindhaan.

16 naangal Romaaburiyil Serndhabodhu, Nootrukku Adhibadhi Than Kaavalilirundhavargalaich Senaabadhiyinidaththil Oppukkoduththaan; Appozhudhu Pavul Thannaik Kaaththirukkira Sevaganudane Thaniththuk Kudiyirukkumpadi Uththaravu Petrukkondaan.

17 moondrunaalaikkuppinbu, Pavul Yoodharil Piradhaanamaanavargalai Varavazhaiththaan; Avargal Koodivandhirundhabodhu, Avan Avargalai Nokki: Sagodharare, Nammudaiya Janangalukkum Nammudaiya Munnorgalin Muraimaigalukkum Virodhamaanadhondraiyum Naan Seyyaamalirundhum, Kattappattavanaaga Erusalemilirundhu Romar Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappatten.
18 avargal Ennai Niyaayam Visaariththabodhu Maranaththukkedhuvaana Kutram Ondrum Ennidaththil Kaanaadhapadiyinaal, Ennai Vidudhalaiyaakka Manadhaayirundhaargal.
19 yoodhargal Adharku Edhirpesinabodhu, Naan Raayanukku Abayamidavendiyadhaayirundhadhu; Aayinum En Janaththaarmel Yaadhoru Kutranj Saattavendumendru Naan Appadich Seyyavillai.
20 indhak Kaariyaththinimiththame Ungalaik Kaanavum Ungaludane Pesavum Ungalai Azhaippiththen. Israveludaiya Nambikkaikkaagave Indhach Sangiliyaal Kattappattirukkiren Endraan.
21 adharku Avargal Unnaikkuriththu Yoodheyaavilirundhu Engalukkuk Kaagidham Varavumillai, Vandha Sagodhararil Oruvanum Unperil Oru Pollaangai Ariviththadhumillai, Adhaippatrip Pesinadhumillai.
22 engum Indha Madhapedhaththukku Virodhamaaip Pesugiradhaaga Naangal Arindhirukkirapadiyaal, Idhaikkuriththu Unnudaiya Abippiraayam Ennavendru Kettariya Virumbugirom Endraargal.

23 adharkaaga Avargal Oru Naalaikkuriththu, Anegamper Avan Thangiyirundha Veettirku Avanidaththil Vandhaargal. Avan Kaalame Thodangi Saayangaalamattum Moseyin Niyaayappiramaanaththilum Theerkkadharisigalin Aagamangalilum Irundhu Yesuvukkaduththa Viseshangalai Avargalukkup Pothiththu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kuriththuch Saatchikoduththu Visthariththup Pesinaan.
24 avan Sonnavaigalaich Silar Visuvaasiththaargal, Silar Visuvaasiyaadhirundhaargal.
25 ippadi Avargal Oruvarodoruvar Ovvaamalirundhu, Purappattuppogaiyil, Pavul Avargalukkuch Sonna Vaakkiyamaavadhu:
26 neengal Kaadhaarakkettum Unaraadhiruppeergal, Kannaarakkandum Paaraadhiruppeergal

27 ivargal Kangalinaal Kaanaamalum, Kaadhugalinaal Kelaamalum, Irudhayaththinaal Unarndhu Gunappadaamalum, Naan Ivargalai Aarokkiyamaakkaamalum Irukkumpadikku, Indha Janaththin Irudhayam Kozhuththirukkiradhu; Kaadhugalinaal Mandhamaaik Kettuth Thangal Kangalai Moodikkondaargal Endru Indha Janaththinidaththil Poich Sollu Enbadhaip Parisuththa Aavi Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyaikkondu Nammudaiya Pidhaakkaludane Nandraaich Solliyirukkiraar.
28 aadhalaal Dhevanudaiya Ratchippu Purajaadhiyaarukku Anuppappattirukkiradhendrum, Avargal Adharkuch Sevikoduppaargalendrum Ungalukkuth Therindhirukkakkadavadhu Endraan.
29 ippadi Avan Sonnapinbu, Yoodhargal Thangalukkulle Migavum Tharkkampannikkondu, Poivittaargal.
30 pinbu Pavul Thanakkaaga Vaadagaikku Vaangiyirundha Veettile Irandu Varushamuzhudhum Thangi, Thannidaththil Vandha Yaavaraiyum Etrukkondu,
31 migundha Dhairiyaththudane Thadaiyillaamal, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kuriththup Pirasangiththu, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvaippatriya Viseshangalai Ubadhesiththukkondirundhaan.
